title: Video: An Advanced Logging Solution Like No Other
description: The Doll Logo12K with System Reith is a cutting-edge timber-hauling machine designed for heavy-duty operations. This versatile vehicle integrates timber picking, loading and transporting into a single, efficient system. Watch it in action on Your Future Machine .
author: Your Future Machine | TTAC Creator
excerpt: The Doll Logo12K with System Reith is a cutting-edge timber-hauling machine designed for heavy-duty operations.This versatile vehicle integrates timber picking, loading and transporting into a single, efficient system.Watch it in action on Your Future Machine.Its rotating cabin can spin up to 300 degrees, allowing the operator to stay inside while handling tasks for increased safety and productivity.
text: Published:  April 23rd, 2025 The Doll Logo12K with System Reith is a cutting-edge timber-hauling machine designed for heavy-duty operations. This versatile vehicle integrates timber picking, loading and transporting into a single, efficient system. Watch it in action on Your Future Machine.Its rotating cabin can spin up to 300 degrees, allowing the operator to stay inside while handling tasks for increased safety and productivity. More by Your Future Machine | TTAC Creator Published April 23rd, 2025 4:00 PM Comments Join the conversation ToolGuy [[make_relative@2025-04-23T17:28:21-04:00, on]] Maverick is better. Lou_BC [[make_relative@2025-04-23T18:32:46-04:00, on]] Interesting but I seriously doubt it would be useful in my part of the world. There is a small market for small timber sale "self-loaders". This isn't heavy duty enough. 8 and 9 axle tridem tractor- trailer combinations are the norm. Logging operations are designed to be most efficient with current equipment. Add Lightness [[make_relative@2025-04-23T20:57:12-04:00, on]] 70 years ago it took 40 loggers 3 months to clearcut a mountainside. Now it is 5 loggers 2 months. With more efficient equipment, it will be 3 loggers 1 month.For full logger employment we need more mountainsides.What can can go wrong with this scenario?
html:
Published:  April 23rd, 2025

The Doll Logo12K with System Reith is a cutting-edge timber-hauling machine designed for heavy-duty operations. This versatile vehicle integrates timber picking, loading and transporting into a single, efficient system. Watch it in action on Your Future Machine.

Its rotating cabin can spin up to 300 degrees, allowing the operator to stay inside while handling tasks for increased safety and productivity. A hydraulic barrier in the truck bed secures timber loads and adjusts to accommodate varying sizes, making it an innovative solution for modern logging operations.

{ "id": "9634744", "alt": "", "title": "", "video_link": "https://www.youtube.com/embed/SHZka8P5Wq0", "youtube_video_id": "SHZka8P5Wq0" }

{ "width": 634, "height": 357, "showRelated": true }

Our mission is to inspire curiosity and excitement by showcasing groundbreaking machines and tools designed to shape the future.

The TTAC Creators Series tells stories and amplifies creators from all corners of the car world, including culture, dealerships, collections, modified builds and more.

April 23rd, 2025 4:00 PM

Comments
Join the conversation

  • ToolGuy [[make_relative@2025-04-23T17:28:21-04:00, on]]

    Maverick is better.

  • Lou_BC [[make_relative@2025-04-23T18:32:46-04:00, on]]

    Interesting but I seriously doubt it would be useful in my part of the world. There is a small market for small timber sale "self-loaders". This isn't heavy duty enough.

    8 and 9 axle tridem tractor- trailer combinations are the norm. Logging operations are designed to be most efficient with current equipment.

  • Add Lightness [[make_relative@2025-04-23T20:57:12-04:00, on]]

    70 years ago it took 40 loggers 3 months to clearcut a mountainside. Now it is 5 loggers 2 months.

    With more efficient equipment, it will be 3 loggers 1 month.

    For full logger employment we need more mountainsides.

    What can can go wrong with this scenario?
